title: Drawing, "Costume Design: Urchin, The Roar of the Grease Paint, The Smell of the Crowd", 1965
medium: Point of brush and black ink, opaque watercolor, graphite on gray illustration board
signed: Signed in point of brush and blue ink at center right: Freddy / Wittop.
inscribed: Inscribed at upper right: Urchin: numbered in black ink at upper right: 8.
description: Costume Design: Urchin, The Roar of the Grease Paint, The Smell of the Crowd

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design: Urchin, The Roar of the Grease Paint, The Smell of the Crowd", 1965.
1965. Point of brush and black ink, opaque watercolor, graphite on gray illustration board. Gift of Freddy Wittop. 1971-1-4.
